name: Virtual Space
description:
Virtual Space is a mission based top down asteroids style space shooter in which a trio of special fighters are pitted against an alien virus in a virtual world. That, along with some neon lasers and avatars makes this science fiction game a bit on the colorful end of things. Players can switch between three characters, each with their own strengths and weaknesses.

Features
  • 8 Missions
  • 3 Playable Characters / Ships
  • Level Up System
  • Power-Ups
  • Fast Paced Combat with Enemy Swarms
